newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Autodesk Q1 estimate cut.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Autodesk Q1 estimate cut.

text.p: - Hanifen, Imhoff Inc said it lowered its fiscal 1998 first quarter earnings estimate and retained a hold rating on shares of Autodesk Inc based on slightly disappointing fiscal 1997 fourth quarter results.

- Hanifen, Imhoff analyst Gary Abbott said he trimmed his fiscal 1998 first quarter earnings estimate to $0.10 a share from $0.14. Autodesk had reported fiscal 1997 fourth quarter earnings of $0.13, down from $0.34 earned last year and below consensus estimates of $0.14 and Abbott's estimate of $0.17.
- Abbott said fiscal fourth quarter revenues were hurt by unfavorable currency effects of about $2.7 million or $0.02 a share.
- The lower earnings estimate reflects a lower revenues and higher marketing expenses from a product launch, he said in a report. For the balance of the year, estimates remain unchanged.
- Autodesk shares were trading off one to 35-1/8.
